hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Mas'ud that :the Prophet (ﷺ) forbade the price of a dog, the payment (given to a prostitute) and the payment made to a soothsayer

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ ثَمَنِ الْكَلْبِ، وَمَهْرِ الْبَغِيِّ، وَحُلْوَانِ الْكَاهِنِ، وَعَسْبِ الْفَحْلِ
